> > Hey, this is kinda gross, but maybe they can Eat and use the

> > abilities?

Yes and no.  It would be like a weakened version of a mimic.  It would 
move the Orc Captains a little/lot closer to Cleric/Mages/Archmages in 
terms of potential strength, even if the "gained" abilites was lost 
once the scenario ended.
